name: My Platinum Box
tag_list: male-grooming, lifestyle, shaving, skincare, membership, subscription-service, samples, fragrance, hair-care, mens-fashion
overview:
My Platinum Box create a distribution channel for samples for brand name nutritional supplements.

The website focuses exclusively on nutritional supplements giving members a chance to try up-to 5 different products every month. Members pay a monthly fee of $12.00 which gives them access to boxes of male essentials that are delivered during the first week of every month. Members can purchase the full size item of the online store for a discounted price. Free shipping is offered on products over $50.
